titles.title: Calling for a democratically elected government for the people of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
7/30/2013--Introduced. Welcomes the free and fair elections for the people of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal.
Joins with the international community in providing the resources necessary to hold such elections, facilitate a peaceful transition of power, and establish a government that will protect the rights of the people.
